downr.title: bradygaster.com
downr.author: brady gaster
downr.footerText: I work for Microsoft but speak for myself.
downr.indexPageText: Brady Gaster is a Christian dad who lives near Seattle, Washington. At work, he and his amazing colleagues work together to make it fun for .NET developers to party in the cloud. At home, he tinkers with MIDI hardware and makes loud music amidst a hurricane of wires.
